name: Bullet Hell: The Afterlife of a Bullet
name_original: Bullet Hell: The Afterlife of a Bullet
description:
Where do bullets ever go once they die? This game tells you just that!

Made for the Indie Games Lab Jam #3 on the theme "Bullet Hell".

We took the theme literally and made bullet hell out of it. You are the Bullet. And you must save yourself from hell!

Shoot enemies with mini bullets or dash/kick onto them for more damage.  Can you reach the Boss Wave?!

Credits :

Arjun Mehta - Main Programmer

Luxasdev - Main Artist | Programmer

Joop Hooijmans - Programmer (Unfortunately, he had to leave mid-way due to some personal problem, we hope he's alright.)

Music by Patrick de Arteaga and David Renda.

Sounds using Bfxr and fesliyanstudios.
